name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 2: Hansel to Gretel
overview: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou: Hansel to Gretel is a game, developed and published by Ima Company, which was released in Japan in 1994, soon after Grimm Meisaku Gekijou 1 Bremen no Ongakutai . The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoons, all of which follows loosely upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The  animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime  Corporation. They made multiple of these cartoon series, this is the second one produced.
